definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: Can use the brush and vacuum cleaners, washing the dust on the coil.
sentences.chinese: 可使用毛刷和吸塵器清洗盤管上的灰塵。

sentences.english: First of all, it's a vacuum cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它是一臺真空吸塵器。

sentences.english: The vacuum cleaner has weak suction.
sentences.chinese: 真空吸塵器的吸力很弱。

sentences.english: Vacuums can a healthy, labor-saving grooming tool.
sentences.chinese: 吸塵器是一種健康省力的梳洗工具。

sentences.english: This morning I thoroughly cleaned the room with a dust catcher.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨我用吸塵器把屋裏吸得很乾淨。

sentences.english: I had just trimmed and mowed the lawn, vacuumed the house, and cleaned the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛剪了草坪用吸塵器清了所有房間還打掃了廁所。

sentences.english: The vacuum cleaner took up the dirt from the rug.
sentences.chinese: 吸塵器把地毯上的灰塵吸掉了。

sentences.english: It's unlawful to lend your vacuum cleaner to your next-door neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 將你家的吸塵器借給隔壁鄰居是非法的。

sentences.english: Some pumps and all vacuum cleaners work by suction.
sentences.chinese: 有些泵和所有的真空吸塵器都是藉吸力工作的。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a cyclone vacuum dust collector.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是有關漩流真空吸塵器的發明。

sentences.english: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum- cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 元帥邁過真空吸塵器，腳步沉重地走出了房間。

sentences.english: Imagine two high-suction vacuum cleaners clamped onto your back.
sentences.chinese: 想像兩臺高吸力真空吸塵器夾在你的背上是什麼感覺。

sentences.english: A good vacuum cleaner for your home helps is a must!
sentences.chinese: 一個好的真空吸塵器肯定是養獵狼家庭的必須品。

sentences.english: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 元帥邁過真空吸塵器，腳步沉重地走出了房間。

sentences.english: Before leaving, Mr.Seymour turned off the vacuum cleaner and the water valve.
sentences.chinese: 在離開之前，西摩先生關掉了真空吸塵器和水閥。

sentences.english: The floor has already been vacuumed.
sentences.chinese: 地板已經用吸塵器清理好了。
